anulom_vilom.name: Anulom Vilom
anulom_vilom.description: Prāṇāyāma: Alternate nostril breathing for balance and purification
anulom_vilom.instructions: Close right nostril with thumb, inhale (pūraka) through left nostril for 4 counts. Close left nostril with ring finger, exhale (recaka) through right nostril for 4 counts. Repeat alternating.
anulom_vilom.benefits: Balances nervous system, purifies energy channels, reduces stress
anulom_vilom.notes: Start with shorter durations and gradually increase

bhastrika.name: Bhastrika
bhastrika.description: Bellows breath for energy and warmth
bhastrika.instructions: Rapid, forceful breathing through both nostrils. Inhale and exhale with equal force and duration, like a bellows.
bhastrika.benefits: Increases energy, warms the body, clears respiratory passages
bhastrika.notes: Practice on empty stomach, avoid if feeling unwell

bhramari.name: Bhramari
bhramari.description: Prāṇāyāma: Bee breathing (Bhramari) for calming the mind
bhramari.instructions: Inhale (pūraka) deeply for 4-5 counts, close ears with fingers, exhale (recaka) slowly making a humming sound like a bee for 8-10 counts.
bhramari.benefits: Reduces anxiety, calms mind, improves concentration
bhramari.notes: Very effective for anxiety and stress relief

body_scan.name: Body Scan
body_scan.instructions: Lie down comfortably and slowly scan your body from head to toe, noticing sensations without judgment.
body_scan.benefits: Reduces stress, improves body awareness, promotes relaxation
cues: Move slowly through each body part
body_scan.notes: Excellent for sleep preparation and stress relief

city_walking_meditation.name: City Walking Meditation
city_walking_meditation.description: GPS-tracked walking meditation adapted for urban environments
city_walking_meditation.instructions: Practice walking meditation in urban settings, using GPS to navigate safely while maintaining mindfulness.
city_walking_meditation.benefits: Urban mindfulness, safe navigation, GPS-guided meditation
cues: Maintain inner peace in urban chaos

cooling_meditation.name: Cooling Meditation
cooling_meditation.instructions: Visualize cool, refreshing energy flowing through your body, bringing calm and peace to every cell.
cooling_meditation.benefits: Reduces body heat, calms the mind, promotes inner peace
cooling_meditation.notes: Perfect for hot weather or when feeling overheated

environmental_breathing.name: Environmental Breathing
environmental_breathing.description: Location-based breathing exercises synchronized with natural environment
environmental_breathing.instructions: Practice breathing exercises that synchronize with your natural environment, using GPS to adapt to your location.
environmental_breathing.benefits: Synchronizes breathing with nature, adapts to environment
cues: Breathe with the rhythm of nature
Feel the air quality around you

kapalabhati.name: Kapalabhati
kapalabhati.description: Skull shining breath for energy and purification
kapalabhati.instructions: Passive inhalation, active forceful exhalation in rapid cycles. Focus on the exhale, let inhale happen naturally.
kapalabhati.benefits: Energizes body, clears sinuses, improves lung capacity
kapalabhati.notes: Practice on empty stomach, avoid if feeling unwell

laughter_therapy.name: Laughter Therapy
laughter_therapy.description: Joyful laughter exercise for stress relief and happiness
laughter_therapy.instructions: Laugh freely and joyfully. Let the laughter come naturally from your belly. Feel the joy and happiness fill your being.
laughter_therapy.benefits: Reduces stress, boosts mood, strengthens immune system, releases endorphins
laughter_therapy.notes: Even fake laughter can trigger real benefits. Start with 'ha-ha-ha' and let it become natural

mindful_walking.name: Mindful Walking
mindful_walking.description: GPS-tracked mindful walking meditation with distance and pace awareness
mindful_walking.instructions: Walk mindfully, paying attention to each step. Let GPS track your movement while maintaining awareness of your body and surroundings.
mindful_walking.benefits: Combines meditation with movement, tracks progress, enhances mindfulness
cues: Feel each step connecting to earth

mindfulness_meditation.name: Mindfulness Meditation
mindfulness_meditation.instructions: Sit comfortably and focus on your breath, gently returning attention to the present moment whenever your mind wanders.
mindfulness_meditation.benefits: Reduces stress, improves focus, enhances emotional regulation
mindfulness_meditation.notes: Foundation practice for all meditation techniques

nadi_shodhana.name: Nadi Shodhana
nadi_shodhana.description: Channel purification breathing for energy balance
nadi_shodhana.instructions: Inhale through left nostril for 4 counts, hold breath for 16 counts, exhale through right nostril for 8 counts. Repeat with opposite nostril.
nadi_shodhana.benefits: Purifies energy channels, enhances focus, balances left and right brain
cues: Inhale 4, hold 16, exhale 8; keep face soft

nature_awareness.name: Nature Awareness
nature_awareness.description: GPS-enhanced nature awareness meditation with environment detection
nature_awareness.instructions: Use GPS to identify your natural environment and practice nature awareness meditation.
nature_awareness.benefits: Connects with nature, uses location for environmental awareness
cues: Notice the natural sounds around you

nature_meditation.name: Nature Meditation
nature_meditation.description: Deep nature meditation with GPS-enhanced environmental awareness
nature_meditation.instructions: Practice deep meditation while being aware of your natural surroundings, using GPS to enhance environmental connection.
nature_meditation.benefits: Deep nature connection, environmental mindfulness, GPS-enhanced awareness

ocean_awareness.name: Ocean Awareness
ocean_awareness.description: GPS-enhanced ocean awareness meditation for beach environments
ocean_awareness.instructions: Use GPS to confirm your beach location and practice ocean awareness meditation.
ocean_awareness.benefits: Connects with ocean energy, beach environment awareness
cues: Connect with the vast ocean energy

ocean_meditation.name: Ocean Meditation
ocean_meditation.description: Deep meditation practice enhanced by ocean environment and GPS awareness
ocean_meditation.instructions: Practice deep meditation by the ocean, using GPS to enhance awareness of your beach environment.
ocean_meditation.benefits: Deep ocean meditation, beach environment awareness, GPS-enhanced experience

chanting.name: OM Chanting
chanting.description: Beautiful OM chanting with music - just listen and feel the peaceful vibrations
chanting.instructions: Welcome to the sacred practice of OM chanting. As the beautiful sitar plays in the background, let the powerful OM chanting wash over you like a divine wave. You can join in softly if you feel comfortable, chanting 'AUM' with devotion, or simply listen and feel the peaceful vibrations. The OM sound represents the entire universe - the past, present, and future. Feel how it connects you to the divine source of all creation. Let this sacred sound purify your mind, open your heart, and bring you into perfect harmony with the cosmos. Chant with love, chant with gratitude, and feel the infinite peace that flows through you.
chanting.benefits: Creates spiritual connection, calms the mind, brings inner peace, connects to divine source, purifies consciousness
cues: Sit comfortably and close your eyes gently
Listen to the sacred OM chanting
Feel the divine vibrations flowing through you
Chant 'AUM' softly if you feel called
Let the OM sound purify your consciousness
Connect to the infinite source of all creation
Feel the peace and love flowing through your being
chanting.notes: Sacred practice for spiritual connection and purification

park_grounding.name: Park Grounding
park_grounding.description: GPS-enhanced grounding practice in park environments
park_grounding.instructions: Use GPS to identify park features and practice grounding techniques specific to park environments.
park_grounding.benefits: Grounds in park environment, connects with nature
cues: Feel your feet on the park ground
Connect with the park's natural energy
Ground yourself in this green space

park_meditation.name: Park Meditation
park_meditation.description: Deep meditation practice enhanced by park environment and GPS awareness
park_meditation.instructions: Practice deep meditation in the park environment, using GPS to enhance awareness of your natural surroundings.
park_meditation.benefits: Deep park meditation, environmental awareness, GPS-enhanced experience
cues: Feel the natural energy around you

progressive_relaxation.name: Progressive Relaxation
progressive_relaxation.instructions: Tense and release each muscle group systematically, starting from your toes and working up to your head.
progressive_relaxation.benefits: Reduces muscle tension, promotes deep relaxation, improves sleep
progressive_relaxation.notes: Excellent for stress relief and sleep preparation

silence.name: Sacred Invocation
silence.description: Begin your meditation journey with peaceful silence and beautiful music
silence.instructions: Sit comfortably, close your eyes gently, and let the beautiful music guide you into a peaceful state. No need to do anything - just listen and relax. Feel the sacred energy flowing through you as you continue this beautiful practice.
silence.benefits: Creates sacred space, calms the mind, prepares for meditation
silence.notes: Essential preparation time before any practice

sanskrit_closing.name: Sacred Sanskrit Closing
sanskrit_closing.description: Beautiful closing with divine blessings and sacred Sanskrit mantras
sanskrit_closing.instructions: Join your hands in prayer position (Anjali Mudra) and recite these sacred mantras with gratitude and devotion. Feel the divine blessings flowing through you. This is your moment of gratitude and spiritual completion.
sanskrit_closing.benefits: Divine blessings, spiritual completion, gratitude, peace, and sacred closure
cues: Bring your hands together in prayer position
Take a deep breath and feel gratitude
Recite: 'Sarve Bhavantu Sukhinam' (May all beings be happy)
Recite: 'Sarve Santu Niraamaya' (May all be free from disease)
Recite: 'Sarve Bhadraani Pashyantu' (May all see auspiciousness)
Recite: 'Maa Kashchit Duhkha Bhaag Bhavet' (May none suffer sorrow)
Bow your head in gratitude and say 'Namaste'

mantras.meaning: May all be free from disease

sanskrit_closing.closingMessage: Thank you for your practice. May divine blessings be with you. Namaste 🙏

sheetali.name: Sheetali
sheetali.description: Cooling breath for relaxation and cooling
sheetali.instructions: Roll tongue into a tube, inhale through the tongue, close mouth, exhale through nose. If you can't roll tongue, purse lips and inhale through mouth.
sheetali.benefits: Cools the body, reduces stress, calms the mind
sheetali.notes: Perfect for hot weather or when feeling overheated

sheetkari.name: Sheetkari
sheetkari.description: Hissing breath for cooling and relaxation
sheetkari.instructions: Open mouth slightly, place tongue behind upper teeth, inhale through teeth making a hissing sound, close mouth, exhale through nose.
sheetkari.benefits: Cools the body, reduces stress, calms the nervous system
sheetkari.notes: Alternative to Sheetali if you can't roll your tongue

tree_breathing.name: Tree Breathing
tree_breathing.description: Breathing exercises synchronized with park trees and natural rhythms
tree_breathing.instructions: Practice breathing exercises that synchronize with the natural rhythms of park trees and environment.
tree_breathing.benefits: Synchronizes with nature, enhances park experience
cues: Breathe with the rhythm of the trees
Feel the oxygen from the park

ujjayi.name: Ujjayi
ujjayi.description: Victorious breath for focus and strength
ujjayi.instructions: Constrict the back of your throat slightly, breathe through nose making a soft ocean-like sound. Focus on the sound and rhythm.
ujjayi.benefits: Builds internal heat, improves focus, strengthens respiratory system
ujjayi.notes: Foundation breath for many yoga practices

urban_centering.name: Urban Centering
urban_centering.description: GPS-guided centering practice for urban environments
urban_centering.instructions: Use GPS to identify your urban environment and practice centering techniques adapted for city settings.
urban_centering.benefits: Centers in urban environment, adapts to city energy
cues: Find your center in the urban environment
Ground yourself in the urban setting

urban_integration.name: Urban Integration
urban_integration.description: Integration of urban meditation experience with GPS route reflection
urban_integration.instructions: Reflect on your urban meditation experience and integrate the insights gained from your GPS-tracked journey.
urban_integration.benefits: Integrates urban meditation, reflects on city journey
cues: Notice how you feel in the city

walking_integration.name: Walking Integration
walking_integration.description: Integration phase for walking meditation with GPS route reflection
walking_integration.instructions: Stand still and reflect on your walking meditation. Notice the route you've taken and integrate the experience.
walking_integration.benefits: Integrates walking meditation experience, reflects on GPS-tracked journey

walking_preparation.name: Walking Preparation
walking_preparation.description: GPS-enhanced preparation for mindful walking meditation
walking_preparation.instructions: Stand comfortably and prepare for mindful walking. Check your GPS location and set your intention for the walking meditation.
walking_preparation.benefits: Prepares body and mind for walking meditation, establishes GPS tracking
cues: Feel your connection to the earth

wave_breathing.name: Wave Breathing
wave_breathing.description: Breathing exercises synchronized with ocean waves and beach rhythms
wave_breathing.instructions: Practice breathing exercises that synchronize with the rhythm of ocean waves and beach environment.
wave_breathing.benefits: Synchronizes with ocean waves, enhances beach meditation
cues: Breathe with the rhythm of the waves
Feel the ocean air in your lungs

welcome_introduction.name: Welcome
welcome_introduction.description: Beautiful welcome and introduction to your meditation journey
welcome_introduction.instructions: Welcome to your journey of self-discovery and inner peace. You've taken the first step toward transformation, and every moment you dedicate to this practice brings you closer to your highest self. For the next few minutes, this beautiful program will guide you gently through exercises designed to calm your mind, energize your body, and awaken your spirit. Trust the process, let go of all worries, and know that this practice will help you tremendously. You are safe, you are guided, and you are loved. Let us begin this sacred journey together.
welcome_introduction.benefits: Creates welcoming atmosphere, sets intention, inspires commitment
cues: Sit comfortably and take a deep breath
Open your heart to receive this gift
Trust in the power of this practice
welcome_introduction.notes: Powerful welcome message to inspire and motivate practitioners

laughter_meditation.name: Laughter Meditation
laughter_meditation.description: Joyful laughter practice for stress relief and happiness
laughter_meditation.instructions: Allow yourself to laugh freely and joyfully. Laughter is a powerful medicine that releases endorphins, reduces stress, and brings lightness to your heart. Let go of all inhibitions and let the natural joy within you bubble up to the surface.
laughter_meditation.benefits: Reduces stress, boosts mood, strengthens immune system, releases endorphins, promotes joy
cues: Take a deep breath and smile
Feel the joy spreading through your body
laughter_meditation.notes: Powerful practice for emotional well-being and stress relief
